mdRecord.dcterms:description: Dedicated 1914. Cram designed and built the sanctuary however the parish house, cloister, manse, and garth, which lie to the south along Michigan Avenue, were designed by Howard Van Doren Shaw. -- https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fourth_Presbyterian_Church_(Chicago) [work]
